data.text:
One day, after I finished training with Maruzensky, 
a horsegirl cautiously approached.
data.processed:
<story>One day, after I finished training with Maruzensky, 
<story>a horsegirl cautiously approached.

data.text: Umm… excuse me! Hello there, Ms. Maruzensky!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Umm… excuse me! Hello there, Ms. Maruzensky!

data.text:
Hello! Hmhm, you don't have to be so formal. 
I believe you're the Special Week girl 
who moved in the other day, aren't you?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Hello! Hmhm, you don't have to be so formal. 
<story>I believe you're the Special Week girl 
<story>who moved in the other day, aren't you?

data.text:
Aiiee! Umm, umm, your running's big time amazin', 
Maruzen! You look so calm, so relaxed, and yet 
you're so fast… I really admire you!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Aiiee! Umm, umm, your running's big time amazin', 
<story>Maruzen! You look so calm, so relaxed, and yet 
<story>you're so fast… I really admire you!

data.text:
I realized that to be the best horsegirl in 
Japan, I'd have to be at least that fast…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I realized that to be the best horsegirl in 
<story>Japan, I'd have to be at least that fast…!

data.text: The best in…? My, is that perhaps your dream?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>The best in…? My, is that perhaps your dream?

data.text: Ah, yes! That's right!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Ah, yes! That's right!!

data.text:
I wanted my moms to see me become the best horsegirl in Japan. 
That's why I came all the way from Hokkaido!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I wanted my moms to see me become the best horsegirl in Japan. 
<story>That's why I came all the way from Hokkaido!

data.text: I see…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>I see…

data.text:
That's great, I think you have a wonderful dream. 
I'm going to be rooting for you too! Do your best, Spe♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>That's great, I think you have a wonderful dream. 
<story>I'm going to be rooting for you too! Do your best, Spe♪

data.text:
Thank you so much…! Ah, um, if you don't mind… 
could we do some training runs together?!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Thank you so much…! Ah, um, if you don't mind… 
<story>could we do some training runs together?!

data.text:
I'd love to run with you, Marzen!! 
I hope I'm not being a bother!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I'd love to run with you, Marzen!! 
<story>I hope I'm not being a bother!!

data.text: With me? Uh, let's see…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>With me? Uh, let's see…

data.text:
… I'll have to check my schedule! 
I'll get back to you later, is that alright?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>… I'll have to check my schedule! 
<story>I'll get back to you later, is that alright?

data.text: Wawah, of course!! I'll see you later…!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Wawah, of course!! I'll see you later…!!

data.text: Yeah, laters～♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Yeah, laters～♪

data.text:
… She looks up to me, huh? 
……………
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>… She looks up to me, huh? 
<story>……………

data.text:
During our meeting about training afterwards, Maruzensky 
occasionally seemed to be dwelling on something.
data.processed:
<story>During our meeting about training afterwards, Maruzensky 
<story>occasionally seemed to be dwelling on something.

data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>……………

data.text: What? Oh…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>What? Oh…

data.text:
… I'm sorry, I couldn't concentrate. I've been 
going over what Spe said to me earlier.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>… I'm sorry, I couldn't concentrate. I've been 
<story>going over what Spe said to me earlier.

data.text:
Yeah… Oh, it's not that I don't want to, you know? A junior came 
asking so cutely, I'd love to help her out.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Yeah… Oh, it's not that I don't want to, you know? A junior came 
<story>asking so cutely, I'd love to help her out.

data.text: It's just, you know… Spe has a very straightforward dream, right?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>It's just, you know… Spe has a very straightforward dream, right?

data.text:
I wondered if there was really anything 
she could gain by running with me…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>I wondered if there was really anything 
<story>she could gain by running with me…

data.text:
… Ahaha, dearie me! I don't know why I always 
get like this so quickly when I'm with you.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>… Ahaha, dearie me! I don't know why I always 
<story>get like this so quickly when I'm with you.

data.text:
… Ahaha, dearie me! I don't know why I always 
get like this so quickly when I'm with you.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>… Ahaha, dearie me! I don't know why I always 
<story>get like this so quickly when I'm with you.

data.text:
She's counting on me, and as her senior, I have to respond! 
Trainer, can I tell Spe that it's OK?
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: Sure, we'll go tell her together.

data.processed:
<story>She's counting on me, and as her senior, I have to respond! 
<story>Trainer, can I tell Spe that it's OK?

data.text:
She's counting on me, and as her senior, I have to respond! 
Trainer, can I tell Spe that it's OK?
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: Sure, let's go tell her together…

data.processed:
<story>She's counting on me, and as her senior, I have to respond! 
<story>Trainer, can I tell Spe that it's OK?

data.text: Thankies♪ So let's go find Spe then, shall we?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Thankies♪ So let's go find Spe then, shall we?

data.text:
Even so, I could still see the hesitation in Maruzensky's step. 
I'm sure she's still worried about whether she can live up to 
the adoration of her juniors.
data.processed:
<story>Even so, I could still see the hesitation in Maruzensky's step. 
<story>I'm sure she's still worried about whether she can live up to 
<story>the adoration of her juniors.

data.text:
But I don't think she should worry too much, the image that the 
younger students and Special Week admire is likely—
data.processed:
<story>But I don't think she should worry too much, the image that the 
<story>younger students and Special Week admire is likely—

data.text: Trainer? What's going on? Let's go!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Trainer? What's going on? Let's go!

data.text: Trainer? What's the matter? Let's get going!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Trainer? What's the matter? Let's get going!

data.text: —so, let's do that training run! Are you free this evening?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>—so, let's do that training run! Are you free this evening?

data.text:
Yes, of course! Thank you very much…! I can't believe I get to 
run with Marzen… I'm gonna have to work hard…!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Yes, of course! Thank you very much…! I can't believe I get to 
<story>run with Marzen… I'm gonna have to work hard…!

data.text:
Oh my… there's no need to be so excited? 
It's just me you're running with…
data.name: Maruzensky

choices.text: What exactly drew you to Marzen?
What precisely has drawn you to Marzen?
choices.processed: <size=39>What precisely has drawn you to Marzen?</size>

data.processed:
<story>Oh my… there's no need to be so excited? 
<story>It's just me you're running with…

data.text: Huh? Hey, trainer? What are you…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Huh? Hey, trainer? What are you…

data.text: Huh? Hey, trainer? What's with you all of a…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Huh? Hey, trainer? What's with you all of a…

data.text:
What I admire about Marzen? Of course it was partly 
just how strong of a horsegirl she is…
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>What I admire about Marzen? Of course it was partly 
<story>just how strong of a horsegirl she is…

data.text:
But what I admire most… is that no matter what race, 
Marzen always seems to be having fun running!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>But what I admire most… is that no matter what race, 
<story>Marzen always seems to be having fun running!

data.text: Wha…?
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Wha…?

data.text:
Don't they say that horsegirls running in the Twinkle 
Series give everyone dreams?
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Don't they say that horsegirls running in the Twinkle 
<story>Series give everyone dreams?

data.text:
I also came here to honor my mom's dream, but… I think it's 
horsegirls like Marzen who can turn those dreams to reality.
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>I also came here to honor my mom's dream, but… I think it's 
<story>horsegirls like Marzen who can turn those dreams to reality.

data.text:
Strong, fast… and having more fun than anyone else. That's what 
makes watching so much fun, so exciting!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Strong, fast… and having more fun than anyone else. That's what 
<story>makes watching so much fun, so exciting!

data.text: Oh Spe…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Oh Spe…

data.text:
… Oh, shoot! I'm on class duty today…! I'm sorry, I have 
to go! I won't be late for the training!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>… Oh, shoot! I'm on class duty today…! I'm sorry, I have 
<story>to go! I won't be late for the training!!

data.text: Ah, y-yeah. See you later～
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Ah, y-yeah. See you later～

data.text: … Trainer. You've done it now!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>… Trainer. You've done it now!

data.text: … Trainer. You've gone and done it now!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>… Trainer. You've gone and done it now!

data.text:
Ooh, you want to play innocent, do you? Hmm, fine I guess. 
…Gosh, what am I to do with you.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>Ooh, you want to play innocent, do you? Hmm, fine I guess. 
<story>…Gosh, what am I to do with you.

data.text:
I see, you want to pretend you don't know, do you? Hmm, fine I 
guess… Gosh, what am I gonna do with you.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>I see, you want to pretend you don't know, do you? Hmm, fine I 
<story>guess… Gosh, what am I gonna do with you.

data.text:
She sees a horsegirl who can fulfill dreams 
and inspire admiration with her running, huh…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>She sees a horsegirl who can fulfill dreams 
<story>and inspire admiration with her running, huh…

data.text: … Now that she's said that, I really can't let her down!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>… Now that she's said that, I really can't let her down!

data.text:
Looking a little refreshed as she said that, Maruzensky later 
went to the training session with Special Week.
data.processed:
<story>Looking a little refreshed as she said that, Maruzensky later 
<story>went to the training session with Special Week.

data.text:
Hah, ha, hah…!! Ugh, she's as amazing as I 
thought… I can't close the gap at all…!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
<story>Hah, ha, hah…!! Ugh, she's as amazing as I 
<story>thought… I can't close the gap at all…!!

data.text: Spe, take a good look. Real speed…
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Spe, take a good look. Real speed…

data.text: Looks something like this!!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Looks something like this!!

data.text: Wahh…!!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed: <story>Wahh…!!

data.text: —Maruzensky displayed her magnificence to her junior.
data.processed: <story>—Maruzensky displayed her magnificence to her junior.

data.text: Phew… I'm back, trainer.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Phew… I'm back, trainer.

data.text: Phew… I'm back, trainer.
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>Phew… I'm back, trainer.

data.text: My, do you think I'm tired already? I'm still going strong♪
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed: <story>My, do you think I'm tired already? I'm still going strong♪

data.text:
And if I'm to show the younger cuties something they can admire — 
I don't have time to stop and wonder!
data.name: Maruzensky
data.processed:
<story>And if I'm to show the younger cuties something they can admire — 
<story>I don't have time to stop and wonder!
